text: Mtumwi amene ali kukuuzani zizindikiro zooneka za Mulungu ndi cholinga choti atsogolere onse amene akhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino kuchokera ku mdima kupita kowala. Ndipo aliyense amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, Iye adzamulowetsa mâ€™minda imene pansi pake pamayenda mitsinje kuti adzakhaleko mpaka kalekale. Ndithudi Mulungu wawapatsa iwo mphotho yabwino kwambiri
